About the Company: Khadim India Limited operates as a footwear retailer in India under the brand Khadims. It also engages in the manufacture and sale of footwear. The company operates approximately 260 retail outlets in 22 states. It also operates two retail stores under the brand Khadims Egaro, which offer garments, footwear, jewellery, gold, and groceries. The company was formerly known as S.N. Footwear Industries Private Limited and changed its name to Khadim Chain Stores Private Limited in 1998. Later, it changed its name to Khadim Chain Stores Limited in June 2005 and to Khadim India Limited in August 2005. The company is based in Kolkata, India.
